message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on scene text detection, which is a computer vision task, hence cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The proposed method involves the use of graph convolutional networks to model appearance and geometry correlations, which falls under the scope of machine learning and artificial intelligence, hence cs.AI and cs.LG are also likely sub-categories. The method also involves the use of context information, which is a common theme in natural language processing, hence cs.CL is a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates its method on benchmark datasets, which falls under the scope of information retrieval, hence cs.IR is also a possible sub-category.
